title: Poster
content:
Can anyone tell me what font is used in this poster? I thought it was Akzidenz-Grotesk, but the Q isn’t quite right.

[http://www.ikea.com/us/en/catalog/products/70151043](http://web.archive.org/web/20091126014844/http:/www.ikea.com/us/en/catalog/products/70151043 "http://www.ikea.com/us/en/catalog/products/70151043")
author: amontonarpapeles

comments.content:
Sure looks like Akzidenz Grotesk Medium to me.

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/akzidenz-grotesk-be/medium/](http://web.archive.org/web/20091126014844/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/akzidenz-grotesk-be/medium/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/akzidenz-grotesk-be/medium/")
I think you’re right. I was mistaken about the Q, maybe my sample was a bit too small or something. Thanks!
